creator: MergeGames
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Merge Fables, where you will explore an island full of stories!
Merge together pieces to meet delightful characters and build the castles of your dreams!
Master the art of huge matches to get the biggest rewards!

Merge Fables Features:

--A Mysterious World--
This magical island is full of all kinds of curious and delightful things. The more you explore, the more surprises you’ll discover!

--Exciting Unique Characters--
Match and merge thousands of different pieces to meet charming fairytale characters and see how they’re adjusting to modern life! Every new character helps you get closer to building the island of your dreams.

--Challenge and Strategy--
Merging is simple and fun but there’s also plenty of strategy involved! Will you merge 3 pieces to get 1 right now, or will you wait until you can get five pieces to get the bonus? The decision is yours!

--Collection and Exploration--
If you are out of resources, you can mine the stones, trees, and more! If you need more space to decorate your world, clear away the mist and go hunting for treasures as you explore the island!

Need help? We're here to help you! Link: https://www.facebook.com/MergeFables
descriptionShort: Merge Fables, Merge Tales, Merge game, Merge items to build your own world!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Don't miss our latest version!
-- Many wonderful events with rich rewards are waiting for you！
--Additional features and bug fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Don't miss our latest version!
Hi, my friend. I am Merlin, the caretaker of Arcadia island, home of the faeries and the dragons...
In the past, all my brothers lived on this island, but they were lost in the mist.
I have reason to believe your merging powers will do the trick. Please, help me restore Arcadia!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hello, my friend, I'm Merlin, the Ancient Caretaker.
In this update, when you merge the final stage of each creature, you shall witness their history.
And 4 new Fairies and Dragons are waiting for you under the fog.
With all these new creatures, it seems like Arcadia Island is getting crowded, but don't worry, a brand new Storage feature is available now. Update to the latest version and experience the new features now!

Merge together pieces to meet delightful characters and build the castles of your dreams!
Master the art of huge matches to get the biggest rewards!

Merge Fables Features:

--A Mysterious World--
This magical island is full of all kinds of curious and delightful things. The more you explore, the more surprises you’ll discover!

--Exciting Unique Characters--
Match and merge thousands of different pieces to meet charming fairytale characters and see how they’re adjusting to modern life! Every new character helps you get closer to building the island of your dreams.

--Challenge and Strategy--
Merging is simple and fun but there’s also plenty of strategy involved! Will you merge 3 pieces to get 1 right now, or will you wait until you can get five pieces to get the bonus? The decision is yours!

--Collection and Exploration--
If you are out of resources, you can mine the stones, trees, and more! If you need more space to decorate your world, clear away the mist and go hunting for treasures as you explore the island!

Need help? We're here to help you! Link: https://www.facebook.com/MergeFables
descriptionShort: Merge Fables, Merge Tales, Merge game, Merge items to build your own world!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hello, my friend, I'm Merlin, the Ancient Caretaker.
In this update, we add 4 new Fairies and Dragons and we also add some new features.
Update to the latest version now!

title: Merge Fables

creator: MergeGames
descriptionHtml:
Bienvenue à Merge Fables, où vous explorerez une île pleine d’histoires ！
Fusionnez les pièces ensemble pour rencontrer les personnages charmants et construisez les châteaux de vos rêves !
Maîtrisez l’art de correspondances énormes pour gagner les plus grandes récompenses !

Caractéristiques de Merge Fables :

--Un Monde Mystérieux--
Cette île magique est pleine de toutes sortes de choses étranges et charmantes. Plus vous explorez, plus de surprises vous découvrirez !

--Personnages Excitants et Uniques--
Faîtes correspondre et fusionnez des milliers de pièces différentes pour rencontrer les personnages charmants dans le conte de fées et voir comment ils s’adaptent à la vie moderne ! Chaque nouveau personnage vous aide à vous rapprocher de la création de l’île de vos rêves.

--Défi et Stratégie--
Fusionner est simple et amusant mais il y a aussi beaucoup de stratégies concernantes ! Fusionnerez-vous 3 pièces pour faire 1 maintenant, ou attendrez-vous jusqu’à ce que vous puissiez obtenir 5 pièces pour gagner le bonus ? La décision vous appartient !

--Collection et Exploration--
Si vous êtes à court de ressources, vous pouvez exploiter les pierres, les arbres et plus ! Si vous avez besoin de plus d’espace pour décorer votre monde, éliminez le brouillard et chassez les trésors lorsque vous explorez l’île !

Besoin d’aide ? Nous sommes ici pour vous aider ! Lien : https://www.facebook.com/MergeFables
descriptionShort: Fusionner, Contes,Mergical,Jeu de Fusion,apparier,prospérer,mettre à niveau

creator: MergeGames
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Merge Fables, where you will explore an island full of stories!
Merge together pieces to meet delightful characters and build the castles of your dreams!
Master the art of huge matches to get the biggest rewards!

Merge Fables Features:

--A Mysterious World--
This magical island is full of all kinds of curious and delightful things. The more you explore, the more surprises you’ll discover!

--Exciting Unique Characters--
Match and merge thousands of different pieces to meet charming fairytale characters and see how they’re adjusting to modern life! Every new character helps you get closer to building the island of your dreams.

--Challenge and Strategy--
Merging is simple and fun but there’s also plenty of strategy involved! Will you merge 3 pieces to get 1 right now, or will you wait until you can get five pieces to get the bonus? The decision is yours!

--Collection and Exploration--
If you are out of resources, you can mine the stones, trees, and more! If you need more space to decorate your world, clear away the mist and go hunting for treasures as you explore the island!

Need help? We're here to help you! Link: https://www.facebook.com/MergeFables
descriptionShort: Merge Fables, Merge Tales, Merge game, Merge items to build your own world!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Don't miss our latest version!
-- Many wonderful events with rich rewards are waiting for you！
--Additional features and bug fixes.

Welcome to Merge Fables, where you will explore an island full of stories!
Merge together pieces to meet delightful characters and build the castles of your dreams!
Master the art of huge matches to get the biggest rewards!

Merge Fables Features:

--A Mysterious World--
This magical island is full of all kinds of curious and delightful things. The more you explore, the more surprises you’ll discover!

--Exciting Unique Characters--
Match and merge thousands of different pieces to meet charming fairytale characters and see how they’re adjusting to modern life! Every new character helps you get closer to building the island of your dreams.

--Challenge and Strategy--
Merging is simple and fun but there’s also plenty of strategy involved! Will you merge 3 pieces to get 1 right now, or will you wait until you can get five pieces to get the bonus? The decision is yours!

--Collection and Exploration--
If you are out of resources, you can mine the stones, trees, and more! If you need more space to decorate your world, clear away the mist and go hunting for treasures as you explore the island!

Enjoying Merge Fables? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!
https://www.facebook.com/MergeFables/

Need help? Contact us by sending an email to servicemergetales@gmail.com
We're here to help you!

title: Merge Fables®

container.value: 21/F, Edinburgh Tower, The Landmark, 15 Queen’s Road Central, Hong Kong

creator: Microfun Limited
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Merge Fables, where you will explore an island full of stories!
Merge together pieces to meet delightful characters and build the castles of your dreams!
Master the art of huge matches to get the biggest rewards!

Merge Fables Features:

--A Mysterious World--
This magical island is full of all kinds of curious and delightful things. The more you explore, the more surprises you’ll discover!

--Exciting Unique Characters--
Match and merge thousands of different pieces to meet charming fairytale characters and see how they’re adjusting to modern life! Every new character helps you get closer to building the island of your dreams.

--Challenge and Strategy--
Merging is simple and fun but there’s also plenty of strategy involved! Will you merge 3 pieces to get 1 right now, or will you wait until you can get five pieces to get the bonus? The decision is yours!

--Collection and Exploration--
If you are out of resources, you can mine the stones, trees, and more! If you need more space to decorate your world, clear away the mist and go hunting for treasures as you explore the island!

Enjoying Merge Fables? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!
https://www.facebook.com/MergeFables/

Need help? Contact us by sending an email to servicemergetales@gmail.com
We're here to help you!

--A Mysterious World--
This magical island is full of all kinds of curious and delightful things. The more you explore, the more surprises you’ll discover!

--Exciting Unique Characters--
Match and merge thousands of different pieces to meet charming fairytale characters and see how they’re adjusting to modern life! Every new character helps you get closer to building the island of your dreams.

--Challenge and Strategy--
Merging is simple and fun but there’s also plenty of strategy involved! Will you merge 3 pieces to get 1 right now, or will you wait until you can get five pieces to get the bonus? The decision is yours!

--Collection and Exploration--
If you are out of resources, you can mine the stones, trees, and more! If you need more space to decorate your world, clear away the mist and go hunting for treasures as you explore the island!

Enjoying Merge Fables? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!
https://www.facebook.com/MergeFables/

Need help? Contact us by sending an email to servicemergetales@gmail.com
We're here to help you!
